statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Unknown"'); cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // 0'); added=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_lines_added // 0'); removed=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_lines_removed // 0'); printf "%s · $%.2f · +%d/-%d" "$model" "$cost" "$added" "$removed"
